text: Beauty must appeal to the senses, must provide us with immediate enjoyment, must impress us or insinuate itself into us without any effort on our part.
author: Claude Debussy

text: The ideal has many names, and beauty is but one of them.
author: Ninon de L'Enclos

text: As an inspiration to the author, I do not think the cat can be over-estimated. He suggests so much grace, power, beauty, motion, mysticism. I do not wonder that many writers love cats I am only surprised that all do not.
author: Carl Van Vechten

text: I'm proud that today, at 43 years old, I've come to value the aging process and focus on inner rather than outer beauty.
author: Carre Otis

text: There's no such thing is aging, but maturing and knowledge. It's beautiful, I call that beauty.
author: Celine Dion
